name: Dog app
description: This app consumes an api which contains information about dogs. User can create dogs and filter and order them by temperament, weight, and alphabetically. It is possible to see what dogs are from API and Data Base. Besides, user can search dog with the search bar.

name: Posh Boutique
description: This is an E-commerce which was built with a team of 8 members. User can see clothe products, buy them, add them to the cart, sign in, sign up, and checkout. Besides, user can search clothe with the search bar. There is an administrator panel where user can add new products, delete products, and edit them.

name: Rick and Morty
description: It is a website which was built with ReactJS and Styled Components. This uses GraphQL to fetch data from an api. User can see characters of Rick and Morty, and can have a history of their appearance. When user clicks on the button it will show a random character.

name: Movie app
description: This app shows popular movies in the moment taking into consideration an API. It is built with React and Styled Components with sass. It is possible to add favorites, remove them, and search by name. Besides, user can read the reviews of some movies.

name: Todo app
description: It is built using ReactJS, Redux, and Styled Components. It is possible to add tasks, complete them, and remove them. Besides, user can see the tasks in the list and in the completed list. It is a perfect app to be productive in your day.

name: Instagram Post
description: This is project is built only with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It is a simple app similar to an Instagram Post. It is possible to make comments and likes. Pictures and Users' name are taken from an API. The same happens with the users' comments.
